page.title: 03STEWARTBY BRICK WORKS
page.content:
buildings, special bricks are also made. 3 Drying: before being fired, moisture must be taken out to stop the clay cracking. This is done by placing the bricks in chambers until all water has evaporated. 4 Firing: clay bricks are fired in kilns where the colour and texture are determined by the clay. 5 Packaging: the bricks are hand-chosen and packed ready for despatch.
Stewartby bricks are cheap in comparison to many materials. They are widely used for building in the local area. The works has attracted workers from all over the country and from other countries eg Italy, India and Pakistan.
